title: 40000riot point wasted on hex box
body: what i want just hex annie dude. give me the last gemstone, 9 gemstone already pls dont be so rude riot.  i have spend all my money just pls

replies.body: Sorry to say this bro but I got hex tech Annie after my 2nd chest

Hi there...

Because riot stole all your money and made you homeless!

for what? An in game skin. 

Just buy another computer and throw out your toaster. Play modern games!

Riot staff ~ Bremo
